mapper.select: select upload_code from bid where tender_code=#{tender_code}

select u.*, case bidNumRank when 1 then 10 when 2 then 8 when 3 then 6 when 4 then 4 when 5 then 2 else 0 end as bidNumScore from(select n.num, d.*, dense_rank() over(order by num desc) bidNumRank from (select count(*) as num,company_code from(select obj.*, b.win_bid_whether, b.company_code from(select t.tender_code, p.refund_whether from tender t, payment p where t.tender_code = p.tender_code and p.refund_whether = 'n') obj, bid b where obj.tender_code = b.tender_code and b.win_bid_whether = 'y') o group by company_code order by num desc) n, bid d where n.company_code=d.company_code and d.tender_code=#{tender_code} order by rownum desc) u

select n.star_score_avg, n.star_score_avg/0.5 as bidStarScore, d.* from (select avg(star_score) star_score_avg, company_code from(select obj.*, b.win_bid_whether, b.company_code from(select t.tender_code, p.refund_whether,p.star_score from tender t, payment p where t.tender_code = p.tender_code and p.refund_whether = 'n') obj, bid b where obj.tender_code = b.tender_code and b.win_bid_whether = 'y') o group by company_code order by star_score_avg desc) n, bid d where n.company_code=d.company_code and d.tender_code=#{tender_code}

select d.*, case bidPriceRank when 1 then 20 when 2 then 16 when 3 then 12 when 4 then 8 when 5 then 4 else 0 end as bidPriceScore from (select dense_rank() over(order by bid_price) bidPriceRank, b.* from (select * from bid where tender_code=#{tender_code}) b) d
